| **Toronto** |  34 |  | 19 | 93 | 84 | 107 | 168 | 215 | 162 | 129 |
| **Washington DC** |  31 | 19 |  | 97 | 76 | 87 | 173 | 215 | 166 | 120 |
| **Frankfurt** |  123 | 93 | 98 |  | 12 | 29 | 238 | 254 | 231 | 197 |
| **London** |  114 | 84 | 76 | 12 |  | 26 | 250 | 266 | 243 | 186 |
| **Madrid** |  119 | 108 | 89 | 29 | 26 |  | 264 | 281 | 256 | 208 |
| **Osaka** |  150 | 169 | 174 | 239 | 249 | 263 |  | 146 | 9 | 293 |
| **Sydney** |  184 | 213 | 215 | 254 | 266 | 279 | 144 |  | 137 | 327 |
